mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tdrive ( carno, drvdate, lastkm, drvclub, useamt, useoil, drvrem, chk2, rependdate, repaddkm, rependchk, drivess) VALUES ( #{carNo}, #{drvDate}, #{lastKm}, #{drvClub}, #{useAmt}, #{useOil}, #{drvRem}, #{chk2}, #{rependdate}, #{repaddkm}, #{rependchk}, (SELECT uuserid FROM tsitepw WHERE userid = #{carNo}))
mapper.update: UPDATE tdrive SET drvdate = #{drvDate}, drvclub = #{drvClub}, lastkm = #{lastKm}, useAmt = #{useAmt}, useoil = #{useOil}, drvrem = #{drvRem}, chk2 = #{chk2}, rependdate = #{rependdate}, repaddkm = #{repaddkm}, rependchk = #{rependchk} WHERE driveid = #{driveID}
mapper.select: SELECT driveID, DATE_FORMAT(drvdate, '%m.%d') AS 'drvdate', drvclub, chk2, lastkm, useamt, useOil, drvrem, rependchk, IF(rependdate IS NULL, '1999-01-01',rependdate) AS 'rependdate', repaddkm FROM tdrive WHERE carno = #{userID} AND drvdate LIKE CONCAT(#{date}, '%') ORDER BY drvclub ASC

SELECT driveID, DATE_FORMAT(drvdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS 'drvdate', drvclub, chk2, lastkm, useamt, useOil, drvrem, IF(rependdate IS NULL, '1999-01-01',rependdate) AS 'rependdate', repaddkm, rependchk FROM tdrive WHERE carno = #{userID} AND driveID = #{driveID}
